title: People who bought kalista and varus skins should be refunded imo
body: if a champ is so unviable to play

replies.body: "they should be refunded for buying things in a free game where big balance changes happen frequently"
That 2% winrate change is making you maaad? It is ok, hug the meta tighter.
I would consider this only if it was after a full rework. Although the recently reworked champions are all pretty good, and I have no interest requesting my RP back.
Even though Kalista is "unviable" she's still a lot of fun to play and I love her VO and aesthetic. There's more to enjoy from this game than just Ranked and Meta.
